text: Bernardo Salim Ribeiro (9 October 1989 - 7 May 2016) was a Brazilian footballer. He played as an attacking midfielder. On February 2011, he completed move to Skënderbeu Korçë. He officially became part of the club in July 2011. In August 2012 he signed for A-League club Newcastle Jets. On 8 May 2016, Ribeiro died of a heart attack during a match in Brazil, aged 26. ==References== Category:1989 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Footballers from Rio de Janeiro (state) Category:People from Nova Friburgo
